generated_text:
- road: The image shows a paved road with visible lane markings and vehicles, including a black car and bicycles, indicating it is a road.
- sidewalk: A pedestrian area is visible alongside the road, separated by a curb, with people walking and standing, which qualifies as a sidewalk.
- vegetation: There are numerous trees and greenery lining the road and surrounding the sidewalk, which falls under vegetation.
- terrain: Grass areas are visible along the sidewalk and in the background, which is categorized as terrain.
- person: Several individuals are visible walking or standing on the sidewalk, fitting the definition of person.
- rider: A person is seen riding a bicycle on the road, which qualifies as a rider.
- car: A black Audi SUV is clearly visible on the road, which is a car.
- bicycle: A bicycle is visible on the road, being ridden by a person, which qualifies as a bicycle.
- pole: A vertical pole is visible on the right side of the image, which fits the definition of a pole.
- traffic sign: A traffic sign is visible on the right side of the image, mounted on a pole, which qualifies as a traffic sign.
- building: A building is partially visible in the background behind the trees, which qualifies as a building.
